title: BuckUTT
desc: An online ticketting student service, and a student card payment. Transits €200 000 per year, and is used by 3600 attendees at the « Gala » of the UTT.

title: IDE & transpiler
desc: A complete IDE (autocompletion, syntax coloration) and a transpiler from custom pseudo-code to C++ to fit a algorithm course language. Used by students during the course.

title: pathfindingjs
desc: A Node C++ addon made for a student robot. Implements optimized A* with the minimum C++ features. Used in the robotics french cup created with the robotics club.

title: nextio
desc: Proof of concept of a regular MVC pattern in NodeJS. Uses RethinkDB as databse, and provies a set of features as DI, routing, mail, internationalization, session, etc..

title: schedulerjs
desc: A JS plugin to manage Promises as sequences, to execute them in order (with a possible delay) and group sequences in a task. Used by the IA of the robotics club's robot.

title: UTT Arena
desc: A website consacred to the UTT Arena, a LAN party with 300 players. Parallax and game-like design, I also organized the event itself, including mounting a bridge scene, etc..

title: Enseack
desc: Participed to an electronics competition with the robotics team. We realized a small prototype within 48 hours that was designed to evaluate benefits of a solar panel.
